name: financial-data-mcp
description: Access financial data and semantic search for Brazilian companies (PETR4, VALE3) with AI-powered earnings call analysis, sentiment tracking, and comprehensive financial metrics
long_description: Advanced MCP server providing financial data and semantic search capabilities for Brazilian companies Petrobras (PETR4) and Vale (VALE3). Features include: 22 periods of quarterly financial metrics (2020-2025), AI-powered semantic search in earnings call transcriptions, sentiment analysis timeline, call highlights extraction, and comprehensive financial analysis tools. Search earnings calls using natural language, track sentiment evolution, and get key insights from executive communications. Perfect for financial analysis, investment research, and AI-powered due diligence.
